sentences.en: baked beans
sentences.cn: 烘豆

sentences.en: Bean sprouts are also sold in cans.
sentences.cn: 也有罐装豆芽出售。

sentences.en: Don't believe him; he's full of beans.
sentences.cn: 不要相信他；他错误太多

sentences.en: Every bean has its black.
sentences.cn: 各人有各人的缺点.

sentences.en: green beans
sentences.cn: 青刀豆，四季豆

sentences.en: I haven't a bean until I get paid.
sentences.cn: 不发工资我可是身无分文.

sentences.en: I'd like to add some pepper to the bean curd.
sentences.cn: 我想在豆腐里加一点辣椒粉.

sentences.en: If low lands must be used for the bean crop, they should be ridged.
sentences.cn: 如果低地必须用于种植豆类作物, 就必须把地整成交替的垄和沟.

sentences.en: It doesn't cost a bean.
sentences.cn: 这一分钱也不用花。

sentences.en: It's called the Pan-Carib-bean Disaster Preparedness and Prevention Project, which is quite a mouthful.
sentences.cn: 它被称为thePan-CaribbeanDisasterPreparednessandPreventionProject（泛加勒比备灾防灾项目），名称相当冗长拗口。

sentences.en: It's quite incredible to think that he now hasn't got a bean.
sentences.cn: 很难相信他现在身无分文。

sentences.en: kidney beans
sentences.cn: 芸豆

sentences.en: Lymph nodes are round or bean - shaped structures strategically placed on lymphatic channel.
sentences.cn: 淋巴结是圆形或豆形的构造,它们被战略性地布置于淋巴管的经路上.

sentences.en: Missed it, old bean; he's pulling your leg.
sentences.cn: 你错了, 老兄; 他在捉弄你呢.

sentences.en: See p. 246 for Thom Bean's response.
sentences.cn: 汤姆·比恩的答复见246页.

sentences.en: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.cn: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.en: Stringer webs have cracked in suspension bridges at the stringer - floor bean connections.
sentences.cn: 在悬索桥的纵梁和横的连接处,纵梁的腹板上发生开裂.

sentences.en: The baby was raised on soya - bean milk.
sentences.cn: 这孩子是用豆浆喂养大的.

sentences.en: The children were too full of beans to sit still.
sentences.cn: 孩子们精力过于旺盛，无法安静地坐着

sentences.en: The enzyme has been partially purified from muny bean shoots.
sentences.cn: 从绿豆幼苗中已部分地提纯了这种酶.

sentences.en: The old man was thrashing the soy - bean crop.
sentences.cn: 那位老汉正在打大豆.

sentences.en: three little people &B{don't amount to a hill of beans} in this crazy world.
sentences.cn: 在这个疯狂的世界上，三个小人物根本算不上什么。

phrases.tran_cn: 一点，丝毫；无价值的东西

phrases.phrase: know how many beans make five
phrases.tran_cn: (英， 非正式)聪明，不会上当
(英 非正式， 旧)［尤用于友好地称呼男子］老伙计

trans.tran_cn: 豆，豆荚，豆科植物，（一文）钱
trans.tran_en: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.
to hit someone on the head with an object
